attributes.action: Harsher penalties to peadofiles longer jail terms
attributes.additional_details: To help stop the child sex trafficking and any peadofiles doing any harm to our children. Give them harsher punishments and longer jail sentences.  Some theifs get longer jail sentences than a peadofile
attributes.background: Peadofiles to get harsher penalties/punishments. And longer jail sentences.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Longer sentences for child sex offenders, sex offenders and rapists: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323338

Mandatory life sentences for child sexual abuse: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304563

Set a mandatory custodial sentence for people found guilty of sexual offences: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302259
